name: USS Enterprise-D
description: Enterprise D was the 5th iteration of the USS Enterprise, the flagship of the Federation in Star Trek: The Next Generation.
weapons: Phaser Array, Photon Torpedoes, Quantum Torpedoes, Tribble

name: USS Pegasus
description: The USS Pegasus was a prototype vessel that served as a testbed for various technologies, including an illegal phasing cloaking device. The Pegasus was lost in 2358 in an accident while testing the phasing cloaking device.

name: USS Voyager
description: Voyager was the first of its class, assigned to a 1-week mission, but ended up stranded in the Delta quadrant for years.
weapons: Phaser Array, Spatial charges, Photon Torpedoes, Tricobalt Warheads

name: USS Defiant
description: The Defiant was initially a prototype warship. Smaller than the average starship, Defiant was fast, agile, powerful, and later had a Romulan cloaking device for use in the Dominion war.
weapons: Phaser Cannons, Phaser Array, Photon Torpedoes, Quantum Torpedoes, Tribble
defenses: Deflector Shields, Ablative Armor, Cloaking Device

name: ISS Defiant
description: The ISS Defiant, not to be confused with the USS Defiant (NX-74205) or the older USS Defiant (NCC-1764), is an identical copy of the USS Defiant (aside from not having a cloaking device). The design was based on specifications of its counterpart, the USS Defiant, which were "acquired" from the prime universe's Deep Space 9 in 2371. This ship has slightly more health and firepower, but fewer torpedoes and no cloaking device.
weapons: Phaser Cannons, Phaser Array, Photon Torpedoes, Quantum Torpedoes

name: ISS Charon
description: The ISS Charon was the flagship of the Terran Empire in the Terran universe. While this ship is over 100 years older than other ships listed, it has considerable fire power and a unique power source. The Charon housed the palace of the Terran emperor before she was taken to the prime universe.
weapons: Heavy Phaser Arrays, Disruptor Cannons, Photon Torpedoes, Large Phaser Cannons, Mycelial Energy Projector

name: IKS Ch'Tang
description: The Ch'Tang was General Martok's command ship during his raid on Trelka V in 2375.
weapons: Disruptor Cannons, Phaser Array, Photon Torpedoes

name: IKS Negh'Var
description: Launched in the early 2370s, it was the first Negh'Var warship in the fleet, and served as the flagship of the Klingon Empire.

name: Belak
description: The Belak was part of the joint Tal Shiar/Obsidian Order fleet that attacked the first Founders' (Dominion) homeworld in 2371 during the Battle of the Omarion Nebula.
weapons: Disruptor Arrays, Phaser Array, Photon Torpedoes

name: Terix
description: The Terix discovered a hull fragment from the experimental USS Pegasus in the Devolin system in 2370. The warbird was subsequently ordered to find the rest of the ship. When the USS Enterprise-D arrived with the same mission and discovered the Pegasus, the Terix 'accidentally' sealed them inside the hollow asteroid containing the Pegasus. The Enterprise escaped using the Pegasus's experimental phasing cloaking device.
weapons: Disruptor Arrays, Phaser Array, Photon Torpedoes

name: Prakesh
description: From 2369 to 2372, this ship was commanded by Gul Dukat of the Second Order, following the loss of his post aboard Terok Nor and as Prefect of Bajor.

name: Koranak
description: This ship was illegally constructed by the Obsidian Order at Orias III and was modified with an increased top speed and the addition of a cloaking device from the Romulans. This ship would fight in the joint Tal Shiar-Obsidian Order assault on the Founders' homeworld in 2371.

name: Jem'Hadar Fighter
description: A Jem'Hadar fighter, or Jem'Hadar attack ship, was a small type of warship that formed the bulk of the Dominion fleet. These versatile starships were also known to perform the roles of patrol ships and scout ships.
weapons: Phased Polaron Beams, Torpedoes (standard), Disruptor Arrays, Energy Dissipater
